articles.description: Corey Kispert led a balanced attack with 14 points and No. 9 Gonzaga beat Loyola Marymount 76-46 on Thursday night to retain at least a share of first place in the West Coast Conference.
articles.headline: Williams leads No. 9 Gonzaga over Loyola Marymount 76-46

articles.description: Nahziah Carter flies through the paint and a teammate for a huge throw down.
articles.headline: Carter leaps over teammate for putback dunk

images.caption: Nahziah Carter flies through the paint and a teammate for a huge throw down.
images.name: Carter leaps over teammate for putback dunk

articles.description: Josh Ajayi had 26 points to go with 14 rebounds to help South Alabama continue its domination of Appalachian State with a 77-66 win over the Mountaineers in Sun Belt Conference action on Thursday night.
articles.headline: Ajayi has 26 points, 14 boards as South Alabama wins 77-66

articles.description: Paul Thomas took an inbounds pass in the wing and drove for the hoop, beating his defender with a spin move to hit a short jumper with two seconds left and UTEP edged Charlotte 87-86 Thursday night in a battle of two teams eager for a win.
articles.headline: Thomas scores winner as UTEP clips Charlotte 87-86

articles.description: Freshman Zach Cooks hit two free throws with four seconds left to give NJIT a 71-69 win over Jacksonville in an Atlantic Sun Conference battle Thursday night.
articles.headline: Zach Cooks free throws lift NJIT past Jacksonville, 71-68

articles.description: Jordan Giles and Brandon McKissic each had 17 points and Isaiah Ross added 14 as UMKC beat Chicago State 76-67 on Thursday night.
articles.headline: Giles and McKissic combine for 34 as UMKC outlasts Cougars
